anathema: Spare an evil fiend, fail to placate Sekhmet with daily rituals
edict: Slaughter your enemies, drink the blood of defeated foes, heal battle injuries
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Sekhmet (Lady of Slaughter)](/Deities.aspx?ID=639)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 6

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Slaughter your enemies, drink the blood of defeated foes, heal battle injuries

**Anathema** Spare an evil fiend, fail to placate Sekhmet with daily rituals

**Area of Concern**
Fire, healing, vengeance, war

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42)

**Favored Weapon** [claw](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) or [Battle Axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=371)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=79), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sure Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1709)

- **4th**
[Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=1748)

- **5th**
[Moon Frenzy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1609)

</column>
name: Sekhmet (Lady of Slaughter)
